files.name: SFS.info
files.data: This project is actually a quite sizeable one, where the idea is to make a VR spaceship flight simulator, I have not made much of a start yet, but the idea at the moment is simply to get a spceship into space and fly it around in VR. But I am very new to VR gamedev and expect this to take a while, partly because I have other things that I focus more onto at the moment.

files.name: 1.log
files.data:
While this idea is still a goal of mine, I am unsure wether I will actually work on it a lot more, maybe I will, maybe I won't not sure just yet

-Eliott

files.name: WorldBuilding.txt
files.data: Lately, I've started more and more wanting to do worldbuilding for Looper Inc., however I never manage to actually get started, but I do have some ideas.

files.name: greetings.log
files.data: Hey there! You've found the terminal console thingy, in here I want to log some projects that are either only yet ideas or too early/small to put into the main page (and maybe some other things who knows?), so explore away in this simulated terminal-interface-ish thingy, and enjoy!
